title: Flight Simulator 2020 - POI - New Zealand -  Fo Guang Shan Temple
description:
In this video we will fly over the  Fo Guang Shan Temple. The Fo Guang Shan Temple of Auckland is a temple and community centre of the Fo Guang Shan Chinese Buddhist movement in the East TƒÅmaki/Flat Bush suburb of Auckland, New Zealand. The temple and complex were built over seven years.[1] It was designed in the architectural style of the Tang Dynasty. The temple also includes a large Buddha statue and a two-tonne bell.
